sentences.en: All thy commandments are faithful : they persecute me wrongfully ; help thou me.
sentences.cn: 诗 119:86 你的命令尽都诚实.们无理地逼迫我. 你帮助我.

sentences.en: All your commands are trustworthy; help me, for men persecute me without cause.
sentences.cn: 你的命令尽都诚实. 他们无理地逼迫我,求你帮助我.

sentences.en: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.
sentences.cn: 逼迫你们的,要给他们祝福.只要祝福, 不可咒诅.

sentences.en: Bless those who persecute you; bless and do not curse.
sentences.cn: 逼迫 你们的、要给他们祝福.只要祝福、不可咒诅.

sentences.en: Blessed are you when people revile you and persecute you and utteryou falselyw on my account.
sentences.cn: 人若因我辱骂你们,逼迫你们,捏造各样坏话诽谤你们,你们就有福了.

sentences.en: If he had determined to persecute her he must take the consequences.
sentences.cn: 如果他胆敢来逼迫她,他会自食恶果.

sentences.en: In my obsession against them, I even went to foreign cities to persecute them.
sentences.cn: 又分外恼恨他们, 甚至追逼他们直到外邦的城邑.

sentences.en: KJV Persecute and destroy them in anger from under the heavens of the LORD.
sentences.cn: [新译]求你在烈怒中追赶他们,从耶和华管治的普天之下除灭他们.

sentences.en: KJV So persecute them with thy tempest , and make them afraid with thy storm.
sentences.cn: [新译]求你也照样用狂风追赶他们, 借暴风雨惊吓他们.

sentences.en: KJV Why do ye persecute me as God, and are not satisfied with my flesh?
sentences.cn: [新译]你们为什么有如神那样逼迫我?还不因吃我的肉感到满足 吗 ?

sentences.en: Let their way be dark and slippery : and let the angel of the LORD persecute them.
sentences.cn: 愿他们的道路,又暗又滑,有耶和华的使者追赶他们.

sentences.en: NIV For they persecute those you wound and talk about the pain of those you hurt.
sentences.cn: [和合]因为你所39击打的,他们就逼迫;你所击伤的,他们戏说他的愁苦.

sentences.en: Persecute and destroy them anger from under the heavens of the Lord.
sentences.cn: 66你要发怒追赶他们,从耶和华的天下除灭他们.

sentences.en: Princes persecute me without cause, But my heart stands in awe of Your words.
sentences.cn: 诗119:161首领无故地逼迫我.但我的心畏惧你的言语.

sentences.en: So persecute them with thy tempest , and make them afraid with thy storm.
sentences.cn: 15求你也照样用狂风追赶他们, 用暴雨恐吓他们.

sentences.en: The Puritans left England to escape being persecuted.
sentences.cn: 清教徒离开了英国以躲避迫害。

trans.tran_en: to treat someone cruelly or unfairly over a period of time, especially because of their religious or political beliefs

trans.tran_cn: （尤指宗教或政治信仰的）迫害，烦扰，困扰，强求，死缠着要
